list-of-lists.title: California Society of Printmakers - where to print?
list-of-lists.description: A list of printmaking cooperatives and workshops in California and the rest of the USA.

list-of-lists.title: Directory of U.S. Arts and CraftsCooperative Service Cooperatives (from 1996)
list-of-lists.description: An oldie, but many of these still exist! Even if they don't, it's fun to look at, right? (In my opinion, it is.)

print-and-press.title: Spudnik Press
print-and-press.description: An affordable and approachable community print studio in Chicago.

print-and-press.title: AIR: Artists Image Resource
print-and-press.description: Artist-run, non-profit print studio and image laboratory located on Pittsburgh's North Side.

print-and-press.title: Perfectly Acceptable Press
print-and-press.description: A small publishing house and Risograph printing studio in Chicago.

print-and-press.title: Bred Press
print-and-press.description: Bred Press is an artist books, comics, and zine publishing house located in Chicago.

print-and-press.title: butterlettuce press
print-and-press.description: butterlettuce is an artist-run publisher of small edition zines and prints. Our mission is to build a catalog that amplifies working-class stories, centers anti-capitalist perspectives, and rejoice in the power of print!

print-and-press.title: Susurrate Press
print-and-press.description: Crafting one-of-a-kind sketchbooks, tomes & fan-bindings by hand.

print-and-press.title: Sadsack Press
print-and-press.description: A collaborative small press in Chicago dedicated to producing both limited editions of fine art prints and objects often created from found and/or recycled materials.

print-and-press.title: Misfeed Press
print-and-press.description: Misfeed is a Print studio in Pittsburgh, PA specializing in zine making and multiples. Offers residency!

print-and-press.title: Paper Jam + Print
print-and-press.description: Paper Jam + Print is a collaborative print studio in downtown Phoenix, AZ that houses SATURNHEX, Shut Eye Press, and Wasted Ink Publishing, three presses that share a common ethos: to provide accessible, intentional, D.I.T. (Do It Together) printing opportunities.
